title: Meditative Ambient - 25 Min Calm Focus Music | Pravos Deep Work Sessions
description:
Experience Meditative Ambient - a 25-minute calming soundscape designed for deep focus and mindful work.

I built Pravos (www.pravos.xyz) to bring the flow state from meditation into my work. After years of context-switching between music apps, timers, and task lists, I wanted one simple workspace that just... works.

The music follows the arc of breath in meditation: settling, deepening, holding, releasing. 25 minutes of unbroken focus. No lyrics. No distraction. Just continuous flow.

Try Pravos: www.pravos.xyz
